name: SecuRemote
0:
”Alexa, ask secure remote To List my devices”
”Alexa, ask secure remote to Lock my door”
”Alexa, ask secure remote to check status of my door”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: secure remote
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the Secu Remote Skill Set.

To get most out of this skill, you required linking your portal.securemote.com account with this skill by Enable SecuRemote Skill.

This skill will help the user to do operations like Lock or Unlock my door name or close or open my door name or check the status of my door name or list my devices or change the pin for unlock or open operation.

For Unlock and Open operation, you have to provide your PIN for authentication. You should reset the PIN every 60 days.

For easy naming pronounce, you can keep the simple name like the front door, home door, office door, garage door, back door, patio door etc.

This smart home skill to work, you need a SecuRemote technology based Lock and SecuRemote Bridge. User must have set up lock and bridge into their account on https://portal.securemote.com

For any further clarification or support, please contact support@delphiansystems.com
